questions.question_text:
SIMULATION -
You are a functional consultant for Contoso Consulting FR (FRSI). FRSI is based in Paris.
You need to modify the dashboard to start in FRSI and to use the following settings:
✑ Country: France
✑ Time zone: Paris
✑ Language: French
To complete this task, sign in to the Dynamics 365 portal.

comments.content: Paris is listed in the third option for the (GMT +1) time zone alongside to Brussels, Copenhagen and Madrid.

discussion.content: Did I miss the fact Paris is not part of the Time Zone? I know it's in zone GMT + 01:00

questions.answer_description:
1. Click the Gear icon in the top right corner of the page.
2. Select User Options from the drop-down menu.
3. Click the Preferences tab
4. In the Startup section, select FRSI in the Company field.
5. Select France in the Country field.
6. Select French in the Language field.
7. Select Paris in the Time zone field.
8. Click Save to save your changes.

questions.question_text:
You need to ensure that employees can submit and approve their own Dynamics 365 Finance workflow requests.
What are two possible ways to achieve this goal? Each correct answer presents a complete solution.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.

discussion.content: Why wouldn't one of the answers be A?

choices.E: Clear the Disallow approval by submitter check box.
choices.B: Add the employees to Azure Active Directory (Azure AD) as domain administrators.
choices.A: Add the employees to the workflow administrator security role.
choices.C: Add the employees as an approver to the workflow action.
choices.D: Create a modification in the code that allows employees to modify workflows.
